page.title: 17HOME LIFE _ Appliances
page.content:
{ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES IN THE HOME
We sent out a questionare to find out which electrical appliances villagers had in their homes. Nearly 100 were returned. These are the results. { { {Cooker_ 92% Kettle_ 99% {Coffee Maker_ 55% Dishwasher_ 12% {Drill_ 63% Dryer_ 40% {Fridge_ 96% Freezer_ 78% {Hair Dryer_ 93% Hedge Cutter_ 29% {Iron_ 100% Lawn Mower_ 82% {Liquidiser_ 51% Microwave_ 17% {Sewing Machine_ 55% Shaver_ 57% {Toaster_ 48% Vacuum_ 80% {Washing Machine_ 80% Food Mixer_ 76% { } { { {
